sections.heading: and regulations.The department may adopt and promulgate rules and regulations to carry out the Enterprise Zone Act

sections.text:
13-2112.Rules and regulations.

The department may adopt and promulgate rules and regulations to carry out the Enterprise Zone Act.

SourceLaws 1992, LB 1240, § 12;Laws 1993, LB 725, § 15;Laws 2014, LB800, § 4;Laws 2019, LB334, § 4.
